high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class LambdaCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.AbstractFunctionCompiler
      • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.LambdaCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompiler

    public final class LambdaCompiler
extends AbstractFunctionCompiler
implements ICompiler
    An instance of this this class controls the compilation of a lambda function.
